Package peregrine.client.proto

Wire protocol for GET/SCAN/PUT responses from the region servers.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
BaseProto  
ChecksumChunkDecoder Checksum decoder that asserts the checksum.
ChecksumChunkEncoder Take a raw ChannelBuffer and build a new ChannelBuffer with a checksum as a suffix.
MetaBlockDictionary A TypedValueMap for metadata for client messages and accessors for fetching those keys.
ProtoReader A reader for reading protocol responses from the server.
ProtoWriter Client protocol response chunkWriter.
 

Exception Summary
ChecksumFailedException  
 

Package peregrine.client.proto Description

Wire protocol for GET/SCAN/PUT responses from the region servers.
